uvi.product_version: versions from v3.4 to before v5.10.76
uvi.description:
can: peak_pci: peak_pci_remove(): fix UAF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.76 by commit 28f28e4bc3a5e0051faa963f10b778ab38c1db69, it was introduced in version v3.4 by commit e6d9c80b7ca1504411ad6d7acdb8683e4ae1c9cd. For more details please see the references link.
